item.title: By: Jerry Hung

item.description: I just use SyncBack Free, or there is also the freeware SQL Backup and FTP, which I don't know if is applicable to you or not<br /> http://sqlbackupandftp.com/

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.content:encoded:
Good read. One thing to note is that you don’t need to roll your own method to get the file name.

System.IO.Path.GetFileName(string) will get you the same thing ðŸ™‚
